item.title: Test Driven Development
item.description: Software development methodology. Outlines a series of practices during software development that aim to focus the process and improve overall quality of the code. Behaviors consist primarily of: Write a test before writing any code Observe the test fail Implement the minimum changes to allow the test to pass Observe the test passing Refactor to improve the existing code Repeat
